RelatedSentence: Canada is concerned by the recent rise in tensions between Vietnam and China in the South China Sea , which have the potential to undermine regional peace and stability .
Canada is concerned by the recent rise in tensions between Vietnam and China in the South China Sea , which have the potential to undermine regional peace and stability .
In particular , we are concerned by dangerous conduct at sea and intimidation of vessels and by recent mainland events that have resulted in the vandalization of private property .

Canada encourages both parties concerned to seek an amicable resolution of disputes , in accordance with international law , and to avoid undertaking any confrontational or intimidating actions that would further escalate tensions in the region .

Canada encourages both parties concerned to seek an amicable resolution of disputes , in accordance with international law , and to avoid undertaking any confrontational or intimidating actions that would further escalate tensions in the region .
We are concerned by actions that may jeopardize freedom of navigation , international trade and maritime security .
